entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Airdrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.6°C

Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 85 %

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
